entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Removing dependency on Parser from BlockContext #66179
    Backlog
  • Interfaces make Rename Property Refactoring dangerous #66177
  • SyntaxGenerator: Consider filtering `async` modifier for methods without a body #66173
  • `DeclarationModifiers.From` doesn't handle constant locals #66172
  • Revise `DeclarationModifiers.From` implementation #66171
  • `DeclarationModifiers.From` doesn't return `readonly` for methods #66170
  • Pattern-based fixed statement behaves inconsistently for nullable value types #66167

Closed

  • Suppress Warning CS6800 when the System Type.GetType(..) method's parameter throwOnError (bool) contains a true value #66025
  • Null check inside a loop affects CS8602 for unrelated code in the same method #61964
    17.5
  • Nullability warning disappears when commenting out *seemingly* unrelated code #61516
    17.5

PullRequests

Created

  • Refactor ParseLoopStatement #66181
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Remove DeclarationScope in favor of ScopedKind #66180
    Area-Compilers
  • Extract a method from ParseIdentifier to allow simplification refactoring. #66178
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Don't rely on unset values from BitVector in nullable state #66174
    Area-Compilers
  • Adding ability for DeclarationModifiers class to support readonly structs and methods #66169
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Keep using statement in extract method #66168

Merged

  • Correct initial state for nested method nullability analysis #66147
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, Next

Updated

  • Ref safety visitor: replace GetVal and GetRef methods with CheckVal and CheckRef #66155
    Area-Compilers
